body_html:
Thanks for the report! This appears to be fixed in master:

>>> import torch
>>> from torch import nn, autograd
>>>
>>> i = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(1, 1, 1))
>>> m = nn.MaxPool1d(2)
>>> m(i)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 357, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/pooling.py", line 65, in forward
    self.return_indices)
  File "/private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/nn/functional.py", line 333, in max_pool1d
    ret = torch._C._VariableFunctions.max_pool1d(input, kernel_size, stride, padding, dilation, ceil_mode)
RuntimeError: Given input size: (1x1x1). Calculated output size: (1x1x0). Output size is too small at /private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/aten/
src/THNN/generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:67
``

body:
Thanks for the report! This appears to be fixed in master:
```
>>> import torch
>>> from torch import nn, autograd
>>>
>>> i = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(1, 1, 1))
>>> m = nn.MaxPool1d(2)
>>> m(i)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 357, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/pooling.py", line 65, in forward
    self.return_indices)
  File "/private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/nn/functional.py", line 333, in max_pool1d
    ret = torch._C._VariableFunctions.max_pool1d(input, kernel_size, stride, padding, dilation, ceil_mode)
RuntimeError: Given input size: (1x1x1). Calculated output size: (1x1x0). Output size is too small at /private/home/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/aten/
src/THNN/generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.c:67
``
